name: Occlusion
description:
Occlusion is a virtual reality demo game designed for the Oculus Rift DK2 that sees the player exploring an “abandoned” space station.

The space station has lost gravity and the player can interact with many flloating objects.

Please note; this is a early, unifinished build. We will add more features soon.

For more information please visit: http://codeloafstudios.com/portfolio/occlusion/

Entry for: http://itch.io/jam/leapmotion3djam

Please send feedback to Thomas@CodeLoafStudios.com
